duties_responsibilities.duty: Assess, plan, implement, and evaluate patient care needs and document patient care in the healthcare record.
Direct and delegate care to other team members in accordance with their education, credentials, and demonstrated competence.
Ensure own professional effectiveness through education and professional development.
Participate in the development of and maintain established hospital policies, procedures, and objectives.

education_certification.credential: Graduate of an approved school of nursing, BSN or current enrollment in a BSN program preferred, Specialty certification preferred
